content: chain 1 single_crochet in same as slip_stitch and around slip_stitch to first single_crochet row 12 chain 1 single_crochet in next 3sc decrease around slip_stitch to first single_crochet 12 sts row 13-17 ch1 single_crochet in same as slip_stitch and around slip_stitch to first single_crochet row 18 chain 1 single_crochet in next 2 single_crochet decrease around slip_stitch to first single_crochet 9 sts row 19 chain 1 single_crochet in next single_crochet decrease around slip_stitch to first single_crochet 6 sts fasten_off leaving a long tail stuff legs use the yarn needle to sew the hole shut sew legs to body this pattern is created by chassity oquendo if you have any problems with this pattern please email me at chassityoquendo@aol com for more patterns visit 7polkadots etsy com note embroider the mouth on using yarn needle and pink color or whatever color you choose and hair curl on head using the brown color all done enjoy your baby doll this pattern is created by chassity oquendo if you have any problems with this pattern please email me at chassityoquendo@aol com for more patterns visit 7polkadots etsy com
